a.n: Le Pouvoir Nuit-il Gravement A La Santé ?

p.d: Recent research in psychology and neuroscience show the extent to which power, solitude and stress affect behaviour. These three elements, indissociable from the function of President of the Republic, raise the following the question: what are the effects of power on heads of state? Investigation. Directed by: Hélene Fresnel, Hélene Risser (France, 2018)
